ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] What view?
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes it can.  EverQuest has multiple camera angles.  You can do 3 different overhead angles and one from behind.  Use the F9 key to change camera views.
ygData.messageBody:
Yes it can.  EverQuest has multiple camera angles.  You can do 3 different overhead angles and one from behind.  Use the F9 key to change camera views.  Default view is always first persion.  Use your mouse scroll wheel (if you have one) to zoom in and out.  F10 removes UI files so you can see full screen.  The minus (-) key on your numeric keypad will take screenshots and save them to either BMP or JPG files in your EverQuest screenshots folder. 
 
And I wish it was $9.95 a montyh.  I pay $12.95 a month.  And I have 2 accounts so I'm actually paying closer to $26/mo for both.
 
Wulfric

From: chronotriggerrox

And I just want to check, I bought the "Everquest Evolutions"
package. I heard that it has a $9.99 monthly fee, is this correct?
Thanks for the help, and when I get my P.C. in about 4 days, I expect
